note:
UK based maker of things, mostly for LARP. I love coding and get to dabble in web design and prying information out of spreadsheets at work. I enjoy Tai chi and it has been a massive help to my M.E./CFS. Pronouns She/her.

Profile image description: me in a 'dress' I made in out LARP group green and black colours with the Tree symbol on the front.

Banner image description: me in the middle of our group LARP tent sorting out some last minute paperwork.
